mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.insert: update member set id=#{id}, pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, regdate=sysdate, updatedate=sysdate, condate=sysdate, status='Y' where m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.update: update member set status='N' where m_no=#{m_no}
update member set status='Y' where m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.select: select * from auth where code=#{code} or email=#{email}
select * from member where email=#{email} or id=#{id} or m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, updatedate=sysdate where m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.select: select * from member where m_no=#{m_no} or email=#{email} or phone=#{email}
select m.* from myclass mc, member m where m.m_no=mc.m_no and lec_no=#{lec_no}
select * from member where m_no not in (select m_no from myclass where lec_no=#{lec_no})
mapper.delete: delete from myclass where lec_no=#{lec_no} and m_no=#{m_no}
